name: TuneBox
tagline: Music chat room using MEAN stack and YouTube API
body:
### Overview
School project for Software Start-up course. The chat room software concentrates on music streaming and connects music enthusiasts with similar interests.

### Features
The users need to register and they are divided to free users with limited number of private chat rooms and premium users with higher limits, who can also create public rooms.

### Upcoming Features
Playlist support, voting mechanism, streaming live, location based suggestions

### Technical Details
The project is implemented using MEAN stack. TuneBox has a browser client and uses YouTube API.

### Authors and Contributors
Four member group (@orostider, @kjghtp, @kasper-stenroos and @aidesign) studying Software Engineering on third year (Bachelor of Engineering).
